entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Dauphin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:50 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dauphin Airport 12:58 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Wind Chill: -11
Wind: NNE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
